TypeSignature.Value: public class DuplexClientBase<TChannel> : System.ServiceModel.ClientBase<TChannel> where TChannel : class
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DuplexClientBase`1<class TChannel> extends System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1<!TChannel>
Public Class DuplexClientBase(Of TChannel) Inherits ClientBase(Of TChannel)
generic <typename TChannel> where TChannel : classpublic ref class DuplexClientBase : System::ServiceModel::ClientBase<TChannel>
type DuplexClientBase<'Channel (requires 'Channel : null)> = class inherit ClientBase<'Channel (requires 'Channel : null)>

span.span: The type of the channel to be created.

summary.span: 用于创建双工服务的通道，并将该通道与回调对象相关联。

span.span: Used to create a channel to a duplex service and associate that channel with a callback object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类创建指定回调对象的服务的通道。Use the class to create a channel to a service that specifies a callback object. 对象包装对象，提供连接，为 WCF 对象。The object wraps a object, which provides the connectivity for the WCF object. 您可以使用任一类型连接至双工服务。You can use either type to connect to a duplex service. 有关双工服务的详细信息，请参阅[双工服务](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/duplex-services.md)For more information about duplex services, see [Duplex Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/duplex-services.md). 针对从此类派生的托管 C++ 用户的特别说明：Special note for Managed C++ users deriving from this class: - 将清理代码放入 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）中，而不是放入析构函数中。Put your cleanup code in (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort), not in a destructor. - 避免使用析构函数：它们会导致编译器自动生成 Avoid destructors: they cause the compiler to auto-generate - 避免使用非引用成员：它们可能会导致编译器自动生成 Avoid non-reference members: they can cause the compiler to auto-generate - 避免使用终结器；但如果包含一个终结器，则应该禁止显示生成警告并从 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）调用 和终结器本身，以便模拟自动生成的 行为。Avoid finalizers; but if you include one, you should suppress the build warning and call and the finalizer itself from (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) in order to emulate what would have been the auto-generated behavior. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用双工 WCF 客户端类型，在客户端`SampleDuplexHelloClient`，以传递新对象和回调对象以侦听回调。The following example shows the use in the client of a duplex WCF client type, the `SampleDuplexHelloClient`, to pass a new object with the callback object to listen for callbacks. [!code-csharp[CallbackBehaviorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CallbackBehaviorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/vb/client.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个新 WCF对象使用`callbackInstance`对象以处理所有回调操作。WCF creates a new object using the `callbackInstance` object to handle all callback operations.
